message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 2-3-2, translated into all languages

data.en:
Note on the proposed “Methodology for Computing and Monitoring the sustainable Development Goal Indicator 2.3.1 and 2.3.2”, Office of the Chief Statistician and Statistics Division, FAO, Rome https://www.fao.org/3/ca3043en/CA3043EN.pdf

Defining Small Scale Food producers to Monitor Target 2.3 of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. FAO Statistics Division Working Paper available at http://www.fao.org/3/a-i6858e.pdf
data.fr:
Note sur le document « Methodology for Computing and Monitoring the Sustainable Development Goal Indicator 2.3.1 and 2.3.2 », Bureau du Statisticien en chef et Division de la statistique, FAO, Rome

« Defining Small Scale Food producers to Monitor Target 2.3 of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development ». Document de travail (en anglais) de la Division de la statistique de la FAO disponible à l'adresse http://www.fao.org/3/a-i6858e.pdf
